DOC.brief_title: The Role Hysterolaparoscopy Infertile Patients With Normal Hysterosalpingography
DOC.detailed_description: The hysteroscopy use rigid continuous flow diagnostic hysteroscopy ( Tuttligen , Karl Storz , Germany ) . It 30o panoramic optic 4mm diameter diagnostic continuous flow outer sheath 6.5 mm diameter . The patient place lithotomy position buttock project slightly beyond table edge . The perineum vagina gently swab povidone-iodine . The cervix expose expose posterior wall retractor tenaculum apply anterior lip . The telescope insert sheath flush distension medium ( saline ) expel air . The technique use provide uterine distension involve attach plastic bag saline dual blood infusion tube . Each bag wrap pressure infusion cuff similar use infuse blood pressure pressure use 100mmHg . A reflex camera ( Olympus ) objective focal length varies f70 f140 together ( Karl Storz ) special zoom length , adapter Hopkins telescope suitable cableware use computer flash unit . The hysteroscopic picture appear optic , transmitted monitor camera fit eyepiece optic panoramic diagnostic hysteroscopy could inform good visualization accuracy . The light generator metal halide automatic light source 150 watt lamp ( model G71A , Circon ACMI , Germany ) switch high cable attach hysteroscope . Dilatation cervix avoid whenever possible avoid leakage medium vagina . The hysteroscope introduce external o advance vision along axis cervical canal . Once cavity enter , overview uterine cavity perform . This follow systematic examination fundus tubal ostia side uterine wall slow rotatory movement telescope . Examination consider normal endometrial cavity easily distend medium complete separation wall vision tubal ostia . Agglutination uterine wall presence thick band extend across cavity occlusion ostial area upper cavity indicate intrauterine adhesion ( IUAs ) . A longitudinal filling defect extend fundus downwards variable level indicate uterine septum . Any pathological lesion polyp , submucous myoma describe accord site , size vascularity . At end procedure , hysteroscope slowly withdrawn cervical canal visualize detect lesion . Diagnostic laparoscopy do proliferative phase menstrual cycle .The patient place dorsal lithotomy position allow vaginal access uterine manipulation ; leg position thigh slightly flex 90o plane abdomen . The buttock slightly edge table sacrum completely support table , avoid back strain . Once primary trocar place , patient place 25o Trendelenberg position help keep bowel pelvis . Clipping pubic hair do , 3 - 4 cm symphysis pubis . Standard anti- septic preparation abdominal skin vagina follow placement specially design fenestrated laparoscopy drape . Vaginal instrument place uterine manipulation drape keep abdominal field separate low vaginal field , follow change glove , avoid contamination abdominal field instrument place abdominal cavity . The patient place complete horizontal position , Veress needle place umbilicus peritoneal cavity , avoid retro peritoneal vessel intestinal tract . The abdominal wall elevate manually grasp skin subcutaneous tissue maximize distance umbilicus retroperitoneal vessel . In person average weight , low anterior abdominal wall grasp elevated Veress needle insert toward hollow sacrum 45o angle . In patient obese , vertical approach , approximately 70-80o require increased thickness abdominal wall . Correct placement Veress needle confirm number method , hang drop test , injection aspiration fluid Veress needle . After pneumo-peritoneum achieve Veress needle , primary trocar sleeve ( 5mm diameter ) place similar angle Veress needle . Secondary trocars use , identify epigastric vessel transillumination intraperitoneal observation , 2 secondary trocars place . The trocars place laterally , approximately 8 cm midline 8 cm pubic symphysis avoid epigastric , vessel 5.5 cm midline level . Insertion trocar removal sleeve perform direct laparoscopic visualization observe sign hemorrhage . In case bleeding , bipolar electro surgery use achieve hemostasis . Inspection whole peritoneal cavity , uterus , tubes ovary , Douglas pouch , urinary bladder small large intestine well liver do . Any abnormality note record . Then laparoscopic dye chromotubation perform assess tubal patency bilaterally , inject methylene blue via uterine catheter observe spill fimbrial end tube . In case negative spill , bluish discoloration distention proximal part tubes note . At end procedure , carbon dioxide inflation stop 2ry trocars withdraw direct visualization , follow deflation patient 's peritoneal cavity withdrawal 1ry trocars . Sutures place site 1ry 2ry trocars avoid incisional hernia .
